definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Bernd- Schneider : Actually with everyone, but with the Germans the best.
sentences.chinese: 事实上和每个人都很好，但和德国人相处得最好。

sentences.english: However, Germany is a little short on its A-listers.
sentences.chinese: 然而，德国人在人手上还是有点底气不足。

sentences.english: I am enough of a german to give them to go-by .
sentences.chinese: 我是德国人，我可不愿理睬他们。

sentences.english: The Germans took over a century to build this water bridge.
sentences.chinese: 德国人花了整整一个多世纪才建成这座马格德堡水桥。

sentences.english: He was tried because he had acted as a Greman spy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他因在战争期间充当德国人的间谍而受审。

sentences.english: I was obviously a german in italian uniform .
sentences.chinese: 我显然是个披着意军制服的德国人。

sentences.english: There were times when the Germans became suspicious, and she was even interviewed by the Gestapo.
sentences.chinese: 德国人有时起疑，盖世太保甚至找她问话。

sentences.english: It was the most perfidious and dangerous dive bomber the Germans had.
sentences.chinese: 这是德国人拥有的最出色而危险的俯冲轰炸机。

sentences.english: A German grenade had taken three fingers off his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 德国人的手榴弹夺走了他左手的三根手指。

sentences.english: Thousands of people streamed past the now moribund check points.
sentences.chinese: 数千德国人涌到行将就木的检查站。

sentences.english: In the south, the Germans captured Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 在南方，德国人占领了塞瓦斯托波尔。

sentences.english: The women and Lion were herded in there as well, rounded up by another German.
sentences.chinese: 妇女们和莱昂也已被另一个德国人赶到那儿。

sentences.english: Since the invasion of the German, my teacher would never teach German for anything.
sentences.chinese: 德国人入侵以后，我的老师死也不肯再教德文了。

sentences.english: For the Americans studied Kasserine Pass even more intently than the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 美国人对凯瑟琳山口惨败的研究要比德国人认真的多。

sentences.english: Rusty bayonet, Liebgott. You wanna kill Germans?
sentences.chinese: 刺刀生锈了，李高特。你想杀德国人吗？

sentences.english: "General Mud" slowed down the movement of the Germans' lightning attack.
sentences.chinese: “泥泞将军”拖延了德国人闪电式进攻的行动。
